short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let you navigate smoothly while hiding the bookmark bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The bookmarks bar can occupy the browsing window and affect concentration, so I often hide it. However, this makes accessing bookmarks inconvenient. Therefore, I developed the Maple Bookmarks extension. By just using the shortcut Command + E, you can quickly access your bookmarks, which is practical and convenient.
